contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 1173-2020 to designate 578 King Street West (including the entrance address at 580 King Street West) (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: By-Law 1173-2020 - To designate the property at 578 King Street West (including the entrance address at 580 King Street West) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

2020.TE19.10 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act, Alterations to a Designated Property and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 578 King Street West

signedBy: John D. Elvidge, Interim City Clerk
subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 578 King Street West (including the entrance address at 580 King Street West), City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Intention to Designate - 578 King Street West
topics: Heritage > Intention to designate a heritage property
